definition: an acrobatic feat in which the feet roll over the head, either forward or backward, and return, to perform a feat in which the feet roll over the head
details:
noun
- an acrobatic feat in which the feet roll over the head, either forward or backward, and return
= example: an acrobatic feat in which the feet roll over the head, either forward or backward, and return
= synonyms: flip, somerset, summersault, summerset, somersaulting
verb
- to perform a feat in which the feet roll over the head
= example: to perform a feat in which the feet roll over the head
